description:
A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin`emon!
Kandou no Saikai! Momonosuke to Kin`emon
感動の再会! モモの助と錦えもん
